titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Azerbaijan
Azerbaijan

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no legislation governing access to diplomatic archives.

div.head: Location
div.p: Central Directorate of Archives: 3 Ziya M. Bunyatov Prospect, BAKU, AZERBAIJAN, ZIP Code: 370106.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: 4, S. Qurbanov Str., Baku AZ 1009, Azerbaijan.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers could contact the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to inquire about access to diplomatic records. Additionally, records from the Soviet period may be found in Russian archives.
